GRAPE:
With your GRAPE rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes,
2. Single-stake GRAPE in the Vineyard to earn WINE,
3. Pair GRAPE with MIM and stake it in the Vineyard to earn WINE.
WINE:
With your WINE rewards, you can:
1. Stake WINE in Winery to earn GRAPE (when above 1.01 TWAP),
2. Pair with MIM or GRAPE and stake in the Vineyard to earn more WINE,
3. Pair with MIM and stake in the Winepress to earn more WINE-MIM LP.
GRAPE-MIM-SW:
With your GRAPE-MIM-SW rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes,
2. Stake GRAPE-MIM SW LP in the Vineyard to earn WINE,
3. Break the LP, and buy more GRAPE with the MIM.
GRAPE-WLRS-LP:
With your GRAPE-WLRS-LP rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes,
2. Break the LP and single-stake GRAPE in the Vineyard to earn WINE.
